sqlGroup.name: content
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT t.topic_id, t.name, t.free topic_free, c.content_id, c.name content_name, c.free content_free, c.course_name, c.course_video_path, c.game_name FROM am_topic t LEFT JOIN am_content c ON t.topic_id = c.topic_id ORDER BY c.`order`
select * from am_content c left join am_topic_content tc on c.content_id = tc.content_id where c.content_id < ? and topic_id=? order by tc.`order` desc limit 1

sqlGroup.name: contentMission

update am_content_mission set game_mission=? where account=? and content_id=?
select * from am_content_mission where account=? and content_id = (select content_id from am_content where topic_id=? and `order` < ? order by `order` desc limit 1)
